pages.text: The $(mob)Buffalo$() is a passive animal that does not spawn naturally in the $(thing)Overworld$(). Players must perform the $(thing)Buffalo Dance Ceremony$() near a $(l:minecraft_cow)$(mob)Cow$() to imbue it with power, tranforming it into a $(mob)Buffalo$(). It will start as a baby, but mature into an adult in time. Can be bred with $(item)Wheat$().
$(mob)Buffalos$() drop $(item)Buffalo Hide$() on death. This hide can be used for various Totemic recipes, such as the $(item)Medicine Bag$().
The $(mob)Buffalo$() drops $(item)Buffalo Tooth$() on death. This tooth can be used for various Totemic recipes, such as the $(item)Bone Flute$().
